Subskills.name: Napalm Powder
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Spinning Barrel
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of powder trail.

Subskills.name: Barrel of Barrels
Subskills.description: Send forward a big barrel exploding on hit dealing damage and sending smaller barrels to all directions.

Subskills.name: Blowing Up
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by barrel explosions.

Subskills.name: Colliding Barrel
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by powder trail barrels.

Subskills.name: Stacked Fumes
Subskills.description: Every time the barrel hits an enemy it gives you a stacking buff increasing fire skill damage.

Subskills.name: Powder Detonation
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash a fiery pulse dealing additional damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Flaming Barrels
Subskills.description: Send forward multiple barrels. Explosions now sets the ground on fire slowing and dealing damage.

Subskills.name: Dual Barrel
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional barrel.

Subskills.name: Mage of the Trails
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using powder trail.

Subskills.name: Shortened Fuse
Subskills.description: Increases explosion area of effect but decreases traveling time.

Subskills.name: Fragmenting Barrel
Subskills.description: The barrel stops into terrain or on monster hit releasing flying bombs in an arc forward after exploding.

Subskills.name: Heavy Barrel
Subskills.description: Send forward a slowly rolling barrel that knocks monsters back dealing increased damage and stunning them.
